data.name: TERA - Dragon Tamer Pack
data.detailed_description:
Lose yourself in the action-packed world of TERA and pick up a package containing an extra character slot!


In this breathtaking MMORPG you need to take fate in your own hands, carefully aiming your attacks and dodging enemy spells in the dynamic True Action Combat system. Seven races, twelve classes and countless dungeons, battlegrounds and powerful bosses – TERA pushes the boundaries of the MMO genre!

You must install TERA and create a character before you can use this package.

The package contains:

30 Day TERA Club Membership

Enjoy the exclusive benefits of TERA Club membership for 30 days, including a special mount, increased dungeon entries and much more!

1x Additional Character Slot (3-8)

This item expands your character slots by 1. It can be used for slots 3 to 8.

2x Care and Use of Your Pet Dragonette (30 Days)

Dragonette is a small female dragon who will accompany you for 30 days and automatically collect the loot from fallen enemies. Use these items in succession to increase the duration to 60 days.

1000x Fashion Coupon

Fashion Coupons can be exchanged for weapon and armor skins in the game.

10x Valiant Potion

Valiant Potions restore your health.

3x Veteran Resurrection Scroll

Resurrect a fallen teammate with this scroll.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 7 (32-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i3 2130 / AMD FX 4130
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800 GT / Radeon HD 3870
  • DirectX®: 9
  • Hard Drive: 45 GB HD space
  • Network: Broadband internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS:Windows® 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5 3570 / AMD FX 6350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 450 / Radeon HD 4890 1 GB
  • DirectX®: 9
  • Hard Drive: 55 GB HD space
  • Network: Broadband internet connection
